pr_title: Introduce a fail-safe mechanism for the error recorvery of the parser

timeline.message:
Fail-safe mechanism for the error recorvery.
Add a limit for the number of times parser tries to recover staying on the same token index.
This will prevent parser going to infinite loops.

timeline.bodyText: Can we move this check to before calling seekMatch()?
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText: How about a limit of 5? will it break things?
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText:
Looks like other methods don't have the public qualifier. Shall we do the same?
Also, let move this to the other non-private methods section.
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText: IMO, "currentIndex" is too generic. Can we use a descriptive term for this?
timeline.author: sameerajayasoma

timeline.bodyText: previousIndex is also not a descriptive name
timeline.author: sameerajayasoma
